Package com.telefonica.cose.provenance

Interface JSONVerificationInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
JSONVerification
public interface JSONVerificationInterface
The JSONVerificationInterface defines operations for verifying JSON documents and loading them from files. Implementations typically validate JSON structure/content

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode
    loadJSONDocument(String jsonFilePath)
    Loads and parses a JSON document from the specified file path.
    boolean
    verify(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode jsonNode)
    Validates whether the given JSON node meets specific, integrity is preserved.

  • Method Details

    • verify

      boolean verify(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode jsonNode) throws Exception
      Validates whether the given JSON node meets specific, integrity is preserved.
      Parameters:
      jsonNode - The JSON data to verify, represented as a JsonNode
      Returns:
      true if the JSON is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - If validation fails due to structural issues or I/O errors

    • loadJSONDocument

      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode loadJSONDocument(String jsonFilePath) throws IOException, com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Loads and parses a JSON document from the specified file path.
      Parameters:
      jsonFilePath - Path to the JSON file
      Returns:
      JsonNode representing the parsed JSON content
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file cannot be read
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If the file contains invalid JSON syntax
